mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where reply_b_main_num = #{reply_b_main_num} order by reply_b_num
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (m_id, reply_b_type, reply_b_main_num, reply_b_content) values ( #{m_id}, #{reply_b_type}, #{reply_b_main_num}, #{reply_b_content})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply_b_type = #{reply_b_type}, reply_b_content = #{reply_b_content}, reply_b_date = NOW() where reply_b_num = #{reply_b_num}
